summary: WHILE DRIVING IN CRUISE CONTROL, THE BRAKE LIGHT WILL COME ON AND THE VEHICLE WILL ALMOST COME TO A COMPLETE STOP, WITH NO ONE IN FRONT OF ME.  MY WIFE AND I WERE ALMOST IN AN ACCIDENT WHEN THIS HAPPENED ON I-75 AT 65 MPH.  ALSO, THIS BRAKE LIGHT INDICATOR WILL COME ON WITHOUT BEING IN CRUISE.  THIS HAS HAPPENED OVER 6 TIMES.
